mean_cn: v. 溺爱，娇惯；  n. 娇生惯养的人
mean_en: to treat (someone) with more kindness and attention than is appropriate :to treat (someone) too nicely or gently
word_etyma:
molly懦夫 + coddle 溺爱 → vt. 溺爱；纵容
n. 女性化的男人；懦夫
sentence: The parents mollycoddled their child, so he grew up spoiled.
sentence_trans: 这对父母溺爱他们的孩子，所以他娇生惯养的长大。
